mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card_master ( card_comp_code, card_comp_name, card_code, card_name ) VALUES ( #{cardCompCode}, #{cardCompName}, #{cardCode}, #{cardName} )
INSERT INTO card_use_history ( card_code, member_code, use_date, use_cost ) VALUES ( #{cardCode}, #{memberCode}, #{useDate}, #{useCost} )
mapper.select: SELECT cm.card_comp_name, cm.card_name, m.member_name, cuh.use_date, cuh.use_cost FROM card_use_history cuh, member m, card_master cm WHERE cuh.card_code = cm.card_code AND cuh.member_code = m.member_code ORDER BY cm.card_comp_name, cm.card_name, m.member_name, cuh.use_date, cuh.use_cost;
